name: Standard_42-inch_Wood_In-the-Wall_Cove_Niche
description:
Crafted with solid pine, this sturdy cove niche offers four fully adjustable glass shelves for storing toiletries, towels, personal effects and more. Easily installed, this in-the-wall cabinet can be painted or stained to match existing decor.

Features four (4) fully adjustable glass shelvesRecesses into wall between studsEasy installation using only construction adhesiveCan be painted or stained to match easilyIncludes: One (1) nicheMaterials: Solid pine, glassFinish: Natural pineRequires wall opening of 42.125 inches high x 14.125 inches wideOverall dimensions: 45.5 inches high x 17 inches wide x 3.5 inches deepMaterialGlass, WoodTypeMedicine Cabinet, Recessed, Wall CabinetFinishWood Finish
